ingredients.item: 1 fresh lemongrass stalk, halved lengthways and bruised
260g pack skinless, boneless cod fillets, cut into chunks
2 medium Waitrose British Blacktail Free Range Eggs, hard boiled

instructions.step: Bring the stock, coconut milk, laksa paste and lemongrass to the boil in a large pan. Add the noodles, and cook for 3 minutes. Stir in the cod and prawns, and cook for 3 minutes. Add the beansprouts and salad onions, and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until the noodles are tender. Remove the lemongrass.
Divide between 4 bowls and top each with half an egg. Sprinkle with fried onions and coriander to serve.
